context_bundle.summary: Code generation automation: AI tools (GitHub Copilot, Claude, GPT-4), scaffolding (Yeoman, Plop), templates (Jinja2, Handlebars), code generators (Swagger/OpenAPI, Prisma schema). Use for boilerplate, API clients, database models, test stubs. Validate generated code.

onboarding.quick_start: Code generation: AI (Copilot, Claude for complex logic), Scaffolding (yo, plop for boilerplate), Templates (Jinja2, Handlebars for repetitive code), Generators (OpenAPI → client, Prisma → models). Use for: API clients, CRUD operations, test templates. Always review/validate generated code.
common_patterns: AI: GitHub Copilot for inline suggestions
